title: Gym
subtitle: Joining the Gym
description: Lifting weight and burning calories will get you even healthier! To get your reward, redeem the code from your Gym-club to get your tokens.

title: Sport
subtitle: Sport Activities
description: The more sport you do, the more Axper you earn! To get your reward, link the Axper-App with Google Fit to verify your activity.

title: Public Transport
subtitle: Use of public transport
description: Using trains can reduce up to 95% of CO2-emission! To get your reward, link the Axper-App with the SBB Mobile App to verify your ticket purchases.

title: Groceries
subtitle: Buy groceries at the local farmers shop
description: Next time you buy your groceries at the local farmers shop with Twint, you get rewarded! To get your reward, link the Axper-App with Twint to verify your purchases.

title: Driving
subtitle: Sustainable driving with your car
description: Driving with foresight can save up to 50% of fuel for your car! To get your reward, link the Axper-App with your insurance app to verify your car driving records.

title: Rideshare
subtitle: Car seat sharing
description: Sharing your seat with others for your daily commute will reduce heavy traffic up to 20%! To get your reward, link the Axper-App with your HitchHike account to verify your driving records.

title: Volunteering
subtitle: Volunteering program participation
description: Joining a volunteering program will give you social, career and personal benefits!  To get your reward, redeem the code from your program provider to get your tokens.

title: Heating
subtitle: Save energy consumption in your office
description: For each degree saved, energy consumption drops by about 6%. To get your reward, save energy right now.

title: (Train)sport
subtitle: Commute by public transport to your office
description: Commuting by train to work will reduce road traffic and save CO2-Emissions! To get your reward, take the train.
